name: Fragapanophobia
description:
this is a short game that i made in two days. the scare was improvised so please dont expect too much lol.

story: 

you are a guy who has stumbled upon a party room, and you must uncover its secrets.

controls:

WASD / Arrow Keys = movement

E = Interact

Q = drop item

C = toggle crouch

Numbers 1 & 2 = corresponding inventory slots

Tab = pause menu
